verses.content: LALPA chun ka Lalpa kuomah, “I hmêlmahai i ke innghatnaa ka siem hmakhat chu, Ka changtieng ṭhung rawh,” a tih a.
LALPA chun i hrâtna hmawl chu Zion tlânga inthawkin tir suok a tih; Nangin nangma dotuhai laia chun rorêl rawh.
I mihai chu i thilthawtheina nia chun mâni nuomthuin an inpêk hlak a, Inthieng mawinaah, zîngkâr phîng sûnga inthawkin, I tleirâwl daidaw chu i nei a.
LALPA chun ṭawng ân khâm a, inlêt ta naw nih, “Nang chu Melkizedek um dân anga, Chatuon Thiempu i nih ie,” tiin.
LALPA i changtienga um chun, A lunginsen nia chun lalhai sât bawng rem rum a tih.
Hnam tin lai chun rorêl a ta, Hmunhai chu ruongin suksip a ta, Ram tamtaka chun lu chu sât khawi rem rum a tih.
Lampuia vadunga tui chu dâwn a ta, Chu lei chun a lu chu dawm sâng a tih.
